alert.note: Alert for Casey; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 3:56PM EST until February 16 at 4:15PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EST/315 PM CST/ FOR CENTRAL RUSSELL AND SOUTHEASTERN CASEY COUNTIES... At 356 PM EST/256 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jamestown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Russell and southeastern Casey Counties, including the following locations... Sycamore Flat, Eli, Whittle, Windsor, Teddy, Webbs Cross Roads, Esto, Karlus, Bethelridge and Russell Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
